  2. More than 3,000 Boeing defense workers go on strike after rejecting contract  CNBC
  3. Builders of Boeing weapons and fighter jets go on strike  Al Jazeera
  4. IAM District 837 Members in St. Louis Vote to Reject Boeing Defense Contract  IAM Union
  5. Boeing’s second strike in less than a year begins at three defense plants  CNN
